title: How to Do Sentiment Analysis - Intro to Deep Learning #3
excerpt: In this video, we'll use machine learning to help classify emotions! The example we'll use is classifying a movie review as either positive or negative via TF Learn in 20 lines of Python.  Coding Challenge for this video: https://github.com/llSourcell/How_to_do_Sentiment_Analysis  Ludo's winning code:
